description: Arch Bio is an innovative architecture firm founded in 2018, focused on bioclimatic design to enhance living conditions and environmental sustainability. With operations in the UK, Arch Bio aims to transform how we inhabit and construct our world. The organization offers architectural design, consultancy, and construction services, emphasizing resource efficiency and the reuse of materials. Additionally, the Academy Arch Bio Foundation promotes education in sustainable building practices, impacting over 1,500 students since its inception.
name: Arch Bio
